methods.name: colorFormats
methods.short: < format of the color attachments for MRT.

methods.name: depthStencilAsTexture
methods.short: < use a texture instead of a renderbuffer for depth (useful to draw it or use it in a shader later)

methods.name: height
methods.short: < height of images attached to fbo

methods.name: numColorbuffers
methods.short: < how many color buffers to create

methods.name: numSamples
methods.short: < number of samples for multisampling (set 0 to disable)

methods.name: useDepth
methods.short: < whether to use depth buffer or not

methods.name: useStencil
methods.short: < whether to use stencil buffer or not

methods.name: width
methods.short: < width of images attached to fbo
